name: Champion of Light
description:
Description:

Champion of Light is a dungeon crawler story in which the player travels through a hidden world. Fight through monsters and solve puzzles to piece together the story of previous champions, and reveal your own twisted path. In a world created to stop you, you must do everything you can to break the cycle.

 

Champion of Light includes:

-           An explorable dungeon-like world full of strange creatures and mysteries

-           A twisted story that can slowly be pieced together through progression

-          Powerful enemies capable of slowing your progress

-          Puzzles to block you from success

-          Bosses that will do all they can to block your path

-          Multiple tools to help you
